Mellow & Sleazy:
Let us take a look at Mellow & Sleazy's journey on the Spotify Top 200 Weekly South Africa chart. 
 He has had a total of 22 songs with approximately 41962374 million streams. 
As of 2025-04-17, he has released music with Mellow and Sleazy (Pty) Ltd .... Sound African Recordings
He first appeared on the chart on 2021-09-09. His most recent appearance has been on 2025-04-17
His highest position on the chart is 1 for the song Imnandi lento (feat. Tman Xpress) which was at this position on 2023-09-07
His lowest position on the chart is 197 for the song Imnandi lento (feat. Tman Xpress) which was at this position on 2024-07-04 Sporofita (feat. 2woshort, LastbornDiroba, Al xapo & Sunde) which was at this position on 2022-08-18
